# Cargo build directory -- contains only generated files, including many
# BLOBs, and thus should never be added to version control
/target/

# CMake build output -- ditto re: generated BLOBs
/cmake-build-*/

# Backup files generated by rustfmt
**/*.rs.bk

# IDEA/CLion settings
/.idea/

# Mac OS Finder.app settings
.DS_Store
